attributes.action: make an automatic jail term of 10 years for carrying a knife or gun and 20 years for using a knife or gun.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is NO excuse for carrying a weapon in modern society. If there was a standard automatic punishment for this crime I believe their would be an almost immediate drop in the levels of this kind of crime.
There can be no excuses and no 'softly softly' approach for this kind of crime.
